name: Bontouch
description: Bontouch is an award-winning product innovation agency that partners with brands such as Post-it® and Coca-Cola to create world-class digital experiences for their consumers. With 80 designers and engineers on staff, Bontouch serves clients in North America, Europe and China from three studios in Stockholm, New York and London. Today, the products that Bontouch helps create are used by more than 50 million people in 196 countries.
